archdesc.runner: Special Collections, University of Virginia Library

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, University of Virginia Library
did.unittitle: Papers of the President of the University of Virginia 1976-2003
did.physdesc: These files constitute the major record series generated by the office of John Thomas Casteen, president of the University of Virginia since 1990. The records include ca. 21,600 items (54 Hollinger boxes, ca. 22.5 linear feet).

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: Access is prohibited for ten years from the date of creation unless special permission is granted by the President's Office. Under the terms of the Virginia Freedom of Information Act (Sec. 2.1-343 (4), the records of the president or other chief executive officer of any state-supported institution of higher education are exempt from the law's access provisions.

Additional access restrictions may apply to specific student records under the terms of the Family Educational Rights and Privacy Act (F.E.R.P.A.). Items identified as meeting these criteria have been placed in the restricted series of papers, but with its folder of origin noted in the guide.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p:
See the
University of Virginia Library’s use policy.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Papers of the President of the University of Virginia, Accession #RG-2/1/2.041, Special Collections, University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: These papers were transferred from the Office of the President, Madison Hall, University of Virginia through Jo Anne Birckhead on October 21, 2004.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: These files constitute the major record series generated by the office of John Thomas Casteen, president of the University of Virginia since 1990. The records, ca. 21,600 items (54 Hollinger boxes, ca. 22.5 linear feet), 1976-2003, (but chiefly dating from 2000-2003) consist mostly of correspondence, but also include reports, minutes, clippings, memoranda, and related papers concerning all areas of business of the president's office. These papers consist of office administrative files and miscellaneous topical files, mostly arranged alphabetically.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Both the series and file headings used by the president's office have been retained. Restricted material has been placed in its own series. There are four series: Series I) General Files (Boxes 1-35); Series II) Seldom Used Permanent Files (Boxes 35-47); Series III) Committee Files (Box 47); and Series IV) Restricted Files (Boxes 48-54).
